tool_description: Convert HTML content into simplified and plain text format. With this API, you can easily integrate HTML to text conversion capabilities into your applications, platforms, or services, enabling you to extract the essential textual information from HTML documents or webpages.
name: HTML To Text Simplifier
title: HTML To Text Simplifier

api_list.name: Simplify HTML
api_list.description: Simplify HTML that you post as a request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com/simplify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com/simplify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-text-simplifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
